data.Name: Jidax
data.Bio: Best friends since childhood, Jide and Axel (thus their collective stage name: Jidax), have taken the club world by storm since being hand picked to take over the turntables at iconic Champs-Elysees club Queen. Playing alongside world renown DJs from Erick Morillo, Axwell, Calvin Harris and Above & Beyond, to Bob Sinclar, AN21, Alesso and Eric Prydz, Jidax has gained its own following of fans who turnout en masse for their magnetic stage presence, distinctive energy and mindblowing DJ sets. Read more on Last.fm
